name: Devil's Advocate (jorandp)
description:
A game about causing as much chaos as possible between your friends. Chat with them to complete every devilish task and lower your heaven rating.  

    

This game was made for Brackeys game jam 2021.2 but was not submitted in time.

Theme: Let there be chaos

     

Credits:

Joran (jorandp) and Thomas (Linkyen)

Background music by Hooksounds
